meanings.definition: Making or causing a rattling sound.
meanings.sent1: The old car was the rattliest vehicle in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The loose window was the rattliest part of the house.
meanings.sent3: The rattliest door in the house always seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: The rattliest branches of the tree danced in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The rattliest pots and pans clanged together noisily.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of rattly, meaning having a tendency to rattle.
meanings.sent1: The rattliest chair in the room creaked with every movement.
meanings.sent2: The old bike was the rattliest one in the garage.
meanings.sent3: The rattliest drawer in the kitchen always got stuck.
meanings.sent4: The rattliest windows in the house shook in the storm.
meanings.sent5: The rattliest pipes in the building groaned under the pressure.

meanings.sent1: The rattliest engine in the fleet needed immediate repair.
meanings.sent2: The rattliest wheel on the cart wobbled dangerously.
meanings.sent3: The rattliest floorboard in the house squeaked with every step.
meanings.sent4: The rattliest chains on the swing clinked together as the children played.
meanings.sent5: The rattliest roof in the neighborhood echoed with every raindrop.
